name: Composition
title: Composition
description: A set of healthcare-related information that is assembled together into a single logical package that provides a single coherent statement of meaning, establishes its own context and that has clinical attestation with regard to who is making the statement.

elements.name: Composition
elements.description: A set of healthcare-related information that is assembled together into a single logical package.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A version-independent identifier for the Composition.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The workflow/clinical status of this composition.

elements.name: type
elements.description: Specifies the particular kind of composition (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note).

elements.name: category
elements.description: A categorization for the type of the composition - helps for indexing and searching.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: Who or what the composition is about.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: Describes the clinical encounter or type of care this documentation is associated with.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The composition editing time, when the composition was last logically changed by the author.

elements.name: author
elements.description: Identifies who is responsible for the information in the composition, not necessarily who typed it in.

elements.name: title
elements.description: Official human-readable label for the composition.

elements.name: confidentiality
elements.description: The code specifying the level of confidentiality of the Composition.

elements.name: attester
elements.description: A participant who has attested to the accuracy of the composition/document.

elements.name: custodian
elements.description: Identifies the organization or group who is responsible for ongoing maintenance of and access to the composition/document information.

elements.name: relatesTo
elements.description: Relationships that this composition has with other compositions or documents that already exist.

elements.name: event
elements.description: The clinical service, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented.

elements.name: section
elements.description: The root of the sections that make up the composition.
